seo.metaTitle: AtreusPhysio Academy | Professional Physiotherapy Courses & Webinars
seo.metaDescription: Elevate your practice with expert-led courses on Clinical Reasoning, Biomechanics, and Evidence-Based Practice. Learn from experienced physiotherapists at AtreusPhysio Academy.
seo.ogTitle: AtreusPhysio Academy - Professional Development for Physiotherapists
seo.ogDescription: Upgrade your clinical reasoning skills with evidence-based courses and workshops.
seo.twitterDescription: Master clinical reasoning with evidence-based courses for physiotherapists.

structuredData.name: AtreusPhysio Academy
structuredData.description: Professional development courses for physiotherapists focusing on clinical reasoning and evidence-based practice.

hero.title: AtreusPhysio Academy
hero.subtitle: Elevate your practice with expert-led courses. Deep dive into clinical reasoning and evidence-based practice.

offer.title: New Course Series
offer.description: Mastering Clinical Reasoning and Evidence-Based Practice for Physiotherapists.

features.title: Clinical Reasoning
features.desc: Learn HOW to think, not just what to do.

features.title: Evidence Updates
features.desc: Stay current with the latest research breakdowns.

courseList.title: Biomechanics for Physios
courseList.description: Kinematics, kinetics, joint mechanics, load distribution and functional movement patterns.

seo.metaTitle: Biomechanics for Physiotherapists | Advanced Clinical Course
seo.metaDescription: Master kinematics, joint mechanics, and functional patterns. This comprehensive course relates biomechanics directly to clinical assessment and treatment.

structuredData.name: Biomechanics for Physios
structuredData.description: Kinematics, kinetics, joint mechanics, load distribution and functional movement patterns.

learningOutcomes: Understand biomechanical principles and how they influence human movement
Analyse joint mechanics, load transfer and functional patterns with clarity
Apply biomechanics to assessment and exercise based rehabilitation
Build stronger clinical reasoning using mechanical and movement based logic
technicalTerms: Center of mass and ground reaction forces
Joint kinematics and degrees of freedom

courseList.title: Exercise Physiology for Physios
courseList.description: Understand energy systems, muscle physiology, and rehabilitation programming.

seo.metaDescription: Bridge the gap between exercise physiology and clinical rehab. Learn metabolic systems, muscle adaptation, and performance testing.

courseList.title: Pain Mechanism and Physio Management
courseList.description: Modern pain science, bio-psycho-social model, and effective management strategies.

seo.metaDescription: Deep dive into modern pain mechanisms, neurology, and evidence-based management of chronic and acute pain.

courseList.title: Evidence Based Practice for Physios
courseList.description: Learn to interpret research, apply guidelines, and improve clinical outcomes.

seo.metaTitle: Evidence Based Practice Course for Physiotherapists
seo.metaDescription: Master the art of reading research and applying evidence to your clinical practice. Elevate your decision making.

courseList.title: Load Capacity and Recovery The Physio Trinity
courseList.description: Load planning, tissue capacity, recovery logic and return to activity.

seo.metaTitle: Load, Capacity & Recovery Workshop | Physio Trinity
seo.metaDescription: Understanding the vital relationship between training load, tissue capacity, and recovery for optimal rehabilitation.

learningOutcomes: Understand the relationship between load, capacity and recovery
Analyse patient capacity and training tolerance accurately
Plan progressions based on tissue response and adaptation
Make better decisions for return to activity or sport

courseList.title: Application of Fitness Factors and Principles in Physiotherapy
courseList.description: Overload, specificity, volume, intensity, frequency and programming clarity.

seo.metaTitle: Fitness Principles in Physiotherapy | Clinical Workshop
seo.metaDescription: Apply strength and conditioning principles like overload, specificity, and volume to your rehabilitation programs.

learningOutcomes: Understand key fitness principles relevant to physiotherapy
Apply overload, specificity and progression with precision
Plan exercise volume and intensity safely
Build physiotherapy programs that follow structured fitness logic

courseList.title: Beyond IFT UST Manual Therapy The Physio Mindset Shift
courseList.description: Moving from passive care to active rehabilitation and functional outcomes.

seo.metaTitle: Active Rehab vs Passive Modalities | The Physio Shift
seo.metaDescription: Learn why and how to transition your practice from passive modalities to active, functional rehabilitation.

learningOutcomes: Understand limitations of passive modalities in long term outcomes
Shift to active, movement centred clinical thinking
Use patient education as a core treatment tool
Build treatment plans focused on functional and self management

courseList.title: Physio Assessment and Clinical Reasoning
courseList.description: Structured assessment, hypothesis building, flag reasoning and judgement.

seo.metaTitle: Advanced Assessment & Clinical Reasoning | Physio Course
seo.metaDescription: Refine your assessment skills and develop robust clinical reasoning pathways. Identify flags and build accurate hypotheses.

learningOutcomes: Understand the components of a complete physiotherapy assessment
Build strong clinical hypotheses based on findings
Identify red and yellow flags clearly and confidently
Develop consistent, logical clinical reasoning pathways
